name: Galvantula

ability.name: Electroweb
ability.effect: While Galvantula is your Active Pokemon, if the opposing Active Pokemon switches out, the new Active Pokemon's attacks cannot do damage or put status on Galvantula.

attacks.name: Bug Buzz
attacks.effect: Deals 70 damage minus 10 for each damage counter on Galvantula.

flavor: These massive tarantulas are horribly misunderstood, they make for loyal allies to the non-arachnaphobic trainer.
